text: John "Casey" Holt was an American basketball player, part of the New York Renaissance, which was also known as the Harlem Rens.http://www.aaregistry.org/historic_events/view/harlem-rens-win-world- championship Holt took part in the Negro Leagues. The Rens were elected to the Basketball Hall of Fame in 1963 as a team, with three of the players and their coach also being selected as individuals. Holt was a member of the 1932–33 team that won 88 straight games and was called the magnificent 7.https://www.nytimes.com/2009/02/03/sports/basketball/03isaacs.html?_r=0 ==See also== *Black Fives ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Place of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Place of death missing Category:Negro league baseball players Category:New York Renaissance players
title: John Holt (basketball)
